pageContext.claim: “The Paris Agreement isn’t working out so well for Paris. Protests and riots all over France. People do not want to pay large sums of money, much to third world countries (that are questionably run), in order to maybe protect the environment. Chanting “We Want Trump!” Love France.”
pageContext.analysis: No one was chanting "We love Trump" in Paris. This was a claim made by conservative activist Charlie Kirk, but there is no evidence to support it.
